body:
Hello all you wonderful people!
I've decided to drop by here and see how everything is going. My, it's been a while since I've talked to a lot of you. I've seen the current staff, and they seem pretty decent (a special mention to jozzy who has sped through the ranks!) and I'd like to say hello to all the new community members who have no idea who I am :3

For the people who think I'm just some randy, here is some information on myself;
  • I am a "long-time" Avicus / MC Zone player, first joining early 2013
  • I was a decently sized Avicus youtuber (2,000+ subs)
  • I was a previous Avicus staff member
  • I was a well known community member

Feel free to say hi to me, tell me how you're going, I'd love to hear all the news! Hope everyone is going well, and if you need to ask me anything just leave a reply below or chat to me on skype (itzseanpvp)

Thanks guys,
~Sean


*I am most likely going to be selling this account for $$ as I don't have a need for it anymore. If I continue minecraft it will be on my new account ItzSeanYT If you're interested add my skype (itzseanpvp)

replies.body: Who are you? I don't know you... pls explain me who you are xD
replies.body_tagged: Who are you? I don't know you... pls explain me who you are xD

replies.body:
I am a long time Avicus / MC Zone player. Around since about the start of 2013 (just about 2 years soon) I was (might be still) a pretty big member of the community, a previous server moderator, a decent avicus youtuber (2,000+ youtube subs) and a decent minecraft pvper. I quit minecraft (or for some a reallly reaaaly long break) and I've just popped by to say hello.
So...
Hello! My name is Sean, how are you? :DD
